Text:
Access to Internet 
 is a basic right. 
 As are speech 
 and privacy!

These words of wisdom, 
 freedom and rights -
 Were spoken for a girl  
 by a woman

Shrin Faheem will 
 use her mobile unfettered 
 Honourable P.V. Asha decreed

Articles 14, 19 (1)a, 21 
 are to guarantee 
 Equality, information, 
 personal liberty
THINK: Give in a manner that makes the recipient self-reliant.
